ocr_qa.question: What is the sheet title printed in the title block on the lower right?
evidence: The title block reads: ‘MECHANICAL LEVEL & FIRST FLOOR PLAN’.

ocr_qa.question: What is the building name indicated near the title block?
ocr_qa.answer: M.E. RINKER, SR. HALL School of Building Construction
evidence: Text at right reads ‘M.E. RINKER, SR. HALL School of Building Construction’.

ocr_qa.question: Which university is shown on the cover column?
evidence: Printed vertically on the right side of the sheet.

ocr_qa.question: What is the drawing scale for the first floor plan?
evidence: The ‘FIRST FLOOR PLAN’ box at bottom right shows scale 1/8" = 1'-0".

spatial_qa.question: Which room on the first floor plan is located inside the veritical grid G and I horizontally and grid 1 and 2 vertically?
evidence: The room on the first floor plan located inside the veritical grid G and I horizontally and grid 1 and 2 vertically is the Structures Studio.

spatial_qa.question: In the first floor plan, is the M.E.P Studio room located north or south of the central corridor?
evidence: The M.E.P Studio room is located south of the central corridor.

spatial_qa.question: Which half of the sheet contains the mechanical level plan?
spatial_qa.answer: The upper half of the sheet.
evidence: Mechanical equipment symbols and the text ‘MECHANICAL LEVEL PLAN’ appear in the upper region above the main horizontal partition line.

spatial_qa.question: Where is the soil and concrete lab located with respect to the structures studio on first floor?
spatial_qa.answer: The soil and concrete lab is located to the right of the structures studio.
evidence: The soil and concrete lab is located to the right of the structures studio.

counting_qa.question: How many elevator shafts are shown in the building plan?
evidence: One (1)elevator shaft is visible in the building plan.

comparison_qa.question: Which room is largest? The Structures studio, M.E.P studio, or the soil and concrete lab?
evidence: The M.E.P studio is bigger than both the Structures studio and the soil and concrete lab.
